data.actual_result: The value you copied is never actually copied, so you either paste in something that is “old” on your clipboard, or you don’t paste anything at all
data.expected_result: The value you copied on the developers website should be pasted into the text channel typing box
data.short_description: Copying in the app/on the developer website doesn’t actually copy
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the discord developers website, make sure you are using discord’s web browser (on mobile) - Go to applications and open up one - Click one of the copy buttons - Exit out of the browser, back to discord - Paste into a text channel
